1.0.name: wordpress/mootools-accessible-accordion
1.0.description: MooTools Accessible Accordion is an accordion of your blog's recent posts, recent comments and archives and uses the MooTools WAI-ARIA enabled accordion. Use it in a wide widget area, like the "First Footer Widget Area".
